item.description:
Back in the days before pharmaceutical companies, there were wise men and women in communities who understood plant people and how they could help us with different ailments. Jessica is one who understands this today. She will share some of her knowledge with us as well as bring along some teas for us to sample.

This potluck will be followed by a four part class on herbology for those who are interested. Even if you cannot attend the meetup/potluck, you can take part in these classes. Times and prices will be determined soon and posted here.

Bring enough food to feed at least four people and be ready for great food, great conversation and a terrific time!

dance in the light,

Susan
item.name: Learning about the Healing Qualities of Plants
